item.description:
Hi All!

So I know it took a bit, but my old coach from TNT, Katherine Schwab, has confirmed her interest in running some open water swim clinics for the group. They would run for 45 min. and would cost $15.00 plus a $1.00 meetup.com charge for each person - total cost of $16.00.

She is a certified Total Immersion swim coach and without her help I would have never gotten through my first tri. (I was a total noob to swimming).

She can do June 21st, June 28th and July 12th at 7:30 AM at Walden pond. (for directions: http://www.mass.gov/d...
)

There is a minimum of 4 people and a max of 10. If there's enough interest we'll try to do all 3 dates. I'm going to have to say it's a first come first serve basis, and if the clinics fill up we'll have to somehow regulate that a person can only partake in one clinic so everyone gets their fair share.

More about Katherine here:
1) http://www.munchkinmo...
2) http://www.bigdreamsf...

Hope this is well received!

Here's to happy confident open-water swimming!

~ Rebecca

item.why: Meet fellow meetup.com tri peeps, get more confident in your swimming and last b
item.name: Open Water Swim Clinic - Walden Pond
